description.en: Chinese politician, former mayor of Changzhou.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十五届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十五届中央委员会
en: 15th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 杨晓堂是山东武城人。
description.en: Yang Xiaotang is a native of Wucheng, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 杨晓堂毕业于扬州师范学院中文系。
description.en: Yang Xiaotang graduated from the Chinese Department of Yangzhou Normal College.

description.zh-cn: 1981年，担任江苏省金陵石化公司副经理、经理。1982年改任中国石化集团金陵石化公司总经理。
description.en: In 1981, he served as Deputy Manager and Manager of Jiangsu Jinling Petrochemical Company. In 1982, he was appointed General Manager of Sinopec Jinling Petrochemical Company.

description.zh-cn: 1988年任常州市副市长，1990年5月至1992年3月任市长。
description.en: He served as Deputy Mayor of Changzhou in 1988, and Mayor from May 1990 to March 1992.

description.zh-cn: 1992年，升任江苏省副省长。
description.en: In 1992, he was promoted to Deputy Governor of Jiangsu Province.

relationships.target: 中国共产党江苏省委员会

description.zh-cn: 1994年，任江苏省委常委。
description.en: In 1994, he became a member of the Standing Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial Party Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党苏州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 1994年7月至1998年6月，任江苏省委常委兼苏州市市委书记。
description.en: From July 1994 to June 1998, he served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial Party Committee and Secretary of the Suzhou Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1998年，升任国家开发银行副行长。
description.en: In 1998, he was promoted to Vice President of the China Development Bank.

relationships.target: 中国电子信息产业集团

description.zh-cn: 2002年，任中国电子信息产业集团公司总经理。
description.en: In 2002, he was appointed General Manager of China Electronics Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 杨晓堂是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Yang Xiaotang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十五届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 杨晓堂是中国共产党第十五届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: Yang Xiaotang was an alternate member of the 15th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1990年5月，杨晓堂接替曹锦成出任常州市人民政府市长。
description.en: In May 1990, Yang Xiaotang succeeded Cao Jincheng as Mayor of Changzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1992年3月，孟金元接替杨晓堂出任常州市人民政府市长。
description.en: In March 1992, Meng Jinyuan succeeded Yang Xiaotang as Mayor of Changzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1994年7月，杨晓堂接替王敏生出任中国共产党苏州市委员会书记。
description.en: In July 1994, Yang Xiaotang succeeded Wang Minsheng as Secretary of the Suzhou Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1998年6月，梁保华接替杨晓堂出任中国共产党苏州市委员会书记。
description.en: In June 1998, Liang Baohua succeeded Yang Xiaotang as Secretary of the Suzhou Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.
